metadata.title: Block URLs - ForcepointNGFW
metadata.description: This playbook checks if malicious URL is blocked or unblocked by SMC firewall.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially malicious URLs
2. If malicious URL is not blocked by SMC firewall then blocks it.
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Forcepoint SMC API Key should be known.[Refer here](http://www.websense.com/content/support/library/ngfw/v610/rfrnce/ngfw_6100_ug_smc-api_a_en-us.pdf )
3. Forcepoint SMC Version number should be known. [Refer here](https://help.stonesoft.com/onlinehelp/StoneGate/SMC/)
4. URL list name for blocking URLs present in SMC should be known.

metadata.description: Enter name for playbook without spaces. This playbook blocks malicious URLs in Forcepoint SMC.
Enter the name for your Forcepoint SMC Connector without spaces
Enter the api key for smc login
Enter URL List Name present in SMC

Terminate_the_playbook_if_API_issue_occu.description: Terminate the playbook if API issue occurred

body.message:
@{outputs('Forcepoint_Logo')}Forcepoint NGFW-Block URL
The below URL are found to be malicious and playbook taken action against to that URLs.

@{body('Create_HTML_table_for_Add_comment_to_incident')}

Condition_to_check_if_needs_to_be_termin.description: Condition to check if needs to be terminated

Create_HTML_table_for_Add_comment_to_inc.description: Creating a HTML table from all actions taken by URLs

Append_to_array_variable_to_Not_exit_URL.description: Append to array variable to Not exit URL address

Append_to_array_variable_to_array_for_ac.description: Append to array variable to array for actions

Check_the_result_length_from_filter_outp.description: We will check for the result output is empty or exist in the policy rule. If result output is empty ,then there is no policy based on URL. And If result ouput is having some information related to URL then there is a policy with respect to URL

Looping_URLs.description: Here we are looping each URL and check whether it is blocked or not

Set_URL_address_array_from_SMC_URL_addre.description: Set URL address array from SMC URL address list

runError.message: @{variables('URL list name')} does not exist in SMC. Please create URL list in SMC before deploy the playbook.

Set_variable_to_login_unsuccessful.description: When unsuccessful login atempt has done then we can bind the error to "Error" variable.

Terminate_if_login_is_unsuccessful.description: Terminate if login is unsuccessful login attempt

Login.description: Before take an action against to any other api in Forcepoint SMC we need to do login.

inputs.name: Error
inputs.value: URL not found from sentinel incident.

Set_variable_to_error_variable_if_URL_Ad.description: Binding the error to "Error" variable and pass it to incident comment.

Terminate_if_there_are_no_inputs_from_se.description: Terminate the playbook if there are no inputs from sentinel

Check_if_body_present_from_output.description: Form this condition, we will check like if body present in the sentinel incident or not and we will check the URL are available or not.

Initialize_variable_Terminate.description: This holds the variable terminate to terminate the logic app

Initialize_variable_for_URL_Address.description: Binding URL to this URL address variable

Initialize_variable_for_URL_list_name.description: Initialize variable for URL list name

Initialize_variable_to_Error.description: To keep the error into this variable and pass it to wherever required.

Initialize_variable_to_SMC_Api_Version_N.description: To keep SMC Api version number. Forcepoint will update the SMC version every year

Initialize_variable_to_consolidate_varia.description: To form a JSON object to pass it into Allaction variable

Initialize_variable_to_keep_all_actions.description: To store URL , severity , action to be taken into one array varriable and we can create a table.

SMC_API_Key.description: SMC API Key is to store Api key for login
